scripts.test: set NODE_ENV=test && npm run restore-test && jest --watchAll
scripts.test--coverage: set NODE_ENV=test && npm run restore-test && jest --watchAll --coverage
scripts.restore: npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.restore-test: npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env test && npx sequelize db:migrate --env test && npx sequelize db:seed:all --env test
